entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 05:51 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: NNW 26 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then light snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
